content: sweet baby blanket everyone needs a simple go-to baby blanket pattern that can be knit while relaxing in the evening watching tv or while passing the time chatting when you want something in your hands but don t want to think too hard this is mine i hope it brings the little ones in your life much comfort matia needed 6 x 50 g/100m balls of 8 ply merino for bassinet size 8 x 50 g/100m balls of 8 ply merino for cot size 4 0mm needle on 80 cm circular cable let s get stted cast on 145 stitches knit every row for 14 row section one row 1 knit across all stitches row 2 knit 6 stitches purl to last 6 stitches knit 6 stitches repeat these two row 10 times for a total of 20 row section two knit 4 row in garter stitch repeat these two sections six more times for bassinet size nine more times for cot size repeat first section once more both sizes knit every row for 14 row bind off all stitches weave in your ends created by katie andrews @theknitnook
